title: Minimalist Solid Midi Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a minimalist solid-color midi dress, sleeveless, A-line silhouette, scoop neckline, soft matte fabric texture, visible stitching and clean hems, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric rendering, no model, no mannequin
techpack: A-line midi dress in solid cotton sateen with linen blend for breathability. Sleeveless with scoop neckline, invisible side zipper closure, topstitching details, and clean hem finish. Designed for a relaxed fit with minimalistic aesthetic.
provenance: Designed from combination of garment:dress and print:solids/minimalist based on provided trend context.
